overview:
Joe Metro is Farallon’s Vice President of Marketing and Chief Financial Officer. He has over 20 years of diverse executive, strategic and financial experience in business strategy, marketing, finance and administration for organizations in a variety of industries including technology, financial, professional services and non-profit.

At Farallon, Joe has helped shape business strategy aimed at delivering leading edge, high quality services to clients. He is responsible for identifying, recruiting, training and retaining top technical talent. As VP of Marketing, he promotes Farallon’s expertise integrating GIS into organizations with varying levels of GIS sophistication. As CFO, Joe manages Farallon’s financial and administrative functions.

Joe holds an MBA from Kellogg Graduate School of Business / Northwestern University and is a Certified Public Accountant in the state of Illinois.
